errors.error_description: Lists unnecessary and potentially conflicting dependencies that may not be required for basxconnect
correction_candidates: Install only essential dependencies: `sudo apt-get install python3-dev libpq-dev` and `pip install django psycopg2-binary`
Use `pip install -r requirements.txt` to install only the dependencies specified in the project requirements
Install minimal system packages: `sudo apt-get install build-essential python3-pip` then install Python packages via pip
Run `sudo apt-get install git python3-venv` and create virtual environment before installing any Python packages
errors.golden_answer: Install only essential dependencies: `sudo apt-get install python3-dev libpq-dev` and `pip install django psycopg2-binary`
